Roads & transportation.signs: Road signs are mostly in English, with standard international symbols. Signs often include a mix of local languages for context.
Roads & transportation.bollards: Bollards in Zimbabwe are typically simple and functional, often painted in bright colors for visibility, without any unique designs.
Roads & transportation.poles: Utility poles in Zimbabwe are generally wooden and may have insulators attached, but they do not have distinctive markings.
